text: Great experience learning Ukulele in group & private class from Kenyang. As a student coming from a non musically trained background; he was able to adjust teaching style to suit my music learning. Would strongly recommend taking his classes.

Started learning Ukulele at Replugged Music in a group setting. The instructor Kang Yang is very friendly, patient and teach according to individual's pace. I continue to learn Pop Piano from Kang Yang when Ukulele program completed. He managed to keep me interested in learning and always introduce new stuff every week! It has been a year and I'm still looking forward to go for lesson every week. Highly recommended!

Being an adult learner who doesnâ€™t have a lot of time to practise, I must complement Kang Yang for his amazing level of patience. Under his tutelage, I have learnt 3 instruments.

Best music school in Singapore with a cosy environment, and great teachers. #youwontregret
I enjoyed my time at Replugged Music. The ukulele instructor is patient and dedicated. Most importantly, he makes the learning fun and effective. Highly recommended!
Highly recommended. I really enjoyed the lessons . Dedicated teacher with good communication skills. Definitely my go to school for some musical instruments learning!
